title: DRSHANKs
author: DRSHANKs
content: Dr. Shank NFT Airdrop program is worth 10 Dr Shank Eagle NFTs for 10 random lucky winners. By owning unique and truly awesome Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFT Art, you stand a chance to earn up to 3% of the total reward pool in $Ethereum. About Dr. Shank NFTDr. Shank Eagles is an NFT collection of 9’999 unique “D art pieces created as an exciting digital world for the fans and enthusiasts of Golf & Blockchain. Owning a Dr Shank Eagle NFT allows you to participate in the project, be a member of the club, and experience the benefits of the Roadmap.Eagles are nesting in the Ethereum Blockchain (ERC-721). Owning One of the Dr Shank's Eagles is your pass to enter the most exclusive Golf community ever created, receive exclusive merchandising, and stand a chance to earn a sum that can be considerable in $Ethereum. The Official native digital token of Dr Shank "Shankoin" is in development and will be ready to launch by the first quarter of 2023. After Dr Shank's currency is created and deployed, the project will automatically become a DAO. The development of the Golf Metaverse will start soon and is expected to launch by mid/end 2023.How to join the Dr Shank NFT Airdrop?Total Airdrop Allocation:10 Dr. Shank Eagle NFTsAirdrop Start date:7th June 2022Airdrop End date:17th June 2022Winner Announcement date:After 20th June 2022Step-by-Step Guide ''Dr. Shank NFT Airdrop''1. Open the Dr. Shank NFT Airdrop form. 2. Join DR. Shank NFT on Telegram.3. Follow @ShankNFT on Twitter. 4. RT + Like + Tag 3 friends on the pinned Tweet.5. Follow DR. Shank NFT on Instagram.6. Join the DR. Shank NFT’s Official Subreddit.7. Join the DR. Shank NFT’s official Discord Channel.8. Submit your Ethereum wallet address and details to the Form. Good Luck!▪️ Lucky Draw: They will randomly select 10 winners to share 10 Dr. Shank Eagle NFTs (Value per NFT: 0.099 $ETH).** Among the 9'999 Eagles, Dr. Shank has hidden the names of all the professionals playing on the PGA, LPGA, European Tour and Ladies Europen Tour. Each season, Dr. Shank will select his favorite tournaments and reward the holder of the winning Eagle with $ETH. Based on where your player ends up in the final ranking of the tournament, you can receive the following rewards:1st place: 3% of the total available reward pool ($ETH)2nd place: 2% of the total available reward pool ($ETH)3rd place: 1% of the total available reward pool ($ETH)How to Mint? Dr Shank is Giving presale access to the first 999 members on Discord that sends a message telling them you want to be on the whitelist. Very easy! Once you have successfully minted your Dr Shank’s Eagle NFT, you can visualize it in your wallet on OpenSea.

comments.author: DRSHANKs
comments.body: Dr. Shank's NFT Airdrop Will End Soon!Join Today To Become One of The LUCKY WINNERS To Receive an Eagle NFT For FREE.Join NowLimited Time Offer. Lucky Winners Will Be Selected Randomly.
